alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Covington; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Escambia, southeastern Conecuh and southwestern Covington Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Castleberry, or 7 miles northeast of Brewton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brewton, East Brewton, Castleberry and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
